name: Non-linear Adventures on a Euclidean Plane
name_original: Non-linear Adventures on a Euclidean Plane
description:
Left and right arrow keys to steer

Down arrow to look behind you

Space to restart

Exiting the game is not implemented, but alt+f4 works ;)

Rules:

Everything kills you, the rest you'll have to figure out on your own.

Goal: Survive as long as you can
